data.title: Enjoyable to say the least
data.text: This was a great night out. Lots of pool tables and not expensive. 3,5 for an hour. The bar owner was incredible nice, and even reduced the price. Good prices on beer too. There wasn't much music, but it was so enjoyable anyways. Recommended!!

data.title: The best bang for your buck!
data.text: Lots of pool tables.  Great prices on drinks and pool.  Pizza,  popcorn, nachos,  and nuts. You can bring your own food in too. Lots of food places close that deliver here. Lots of different pool leagues. The owner is awesome!  The full time bartender is the best around.  Nothing fancy but great drinks.  Lots of cool people hang out there.
